column4: can anyone help me debug a segfaulting jstest (usb joypad) on dapper?
it segfaults with two different joysticks that work fine under windows, so it is clearly a software problem.
segfaults are always a software problem
hm that joystick package is rather old
you should definitely report the bug to https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+filebug
you can also test your joystick by typing "cat <device>"
and then press a few joystick buttons
and see if it outputs garbage
if it does, your joystick works.
stuff happens when I press the buttons
so now they can work with any application?
with any game that supports joystick, at least.
